S04bsu018_u:551_1: tathāgatas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnagarbham tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etad avocat /
S04bsu018_u:552: "adhivāsayatu me bhagavān idam traimāsaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:554: adhivāsayati kulaputra ratnagarbhas tathāgato rājño 'raṇeminaḥ tūṣṇībhāvena /
S04bsu018_u:555: atha rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:558: so 'haṃ yo me kaścid upabhogaparibhoga upasthānaṃ paricaryāntaḥpuraṃ ca gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato nivedayāmi bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:559: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca" /
S04bsu018_u:562: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:564: te ca vṛkṣā nānāprakārairvastrairalaṅcakre nānāduṣyairnānācchatrairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairnānāprakāraiścābharaṇairnānāratnamayaiścābharaṇairvividhaiḥ [KpSū_56] sugandhaiḥ,
S04bsu018_u:569: tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
S04bsu018_u:571: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā bhagavata upari ratnavṛkṣaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu018_u:572: sa ca vṛkṣo 'laṅkṛtaḥ saptabhī ratnairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairvicitraiścābharaṇairnānāvidhaiśca mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:574: yā cāraṇemino rājño 'gramahiṣī sā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitā,
S04bsu018_u:577: tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:578: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt,
S04bsu018_u:579: buddhābhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvamidaṃ [KpSū_57] satatasamitaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:580: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:581: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ yathā bhagavatastathā,
S04bsu018_u:582: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati,
S04bsu018_u:585: bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ vijahāra sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu018_u:586: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu018_u:587: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat,
S04bsu018_u:588: praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:590: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ [KpSū_58] saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:591: svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:592: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:594: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:595: divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
S04bsu018_u:596: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti,
S04bsu018_u:598: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
S04bsu018_u:599: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
S04bsu018_u:602: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān /
S04bsu018_u:603: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:605: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī /
S04bsu018_u:607: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:608: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:611: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:613: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:614: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:615_1: chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:616: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:617: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:622: punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca" /
S04bsu018_u:623_0: [KpSū_61] yacca rājño 'raṇeminaḥ putrasahasraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya bhagavantamekaikamidamavocat
S04bsu018_u:625: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:626: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:627: tadyathā rājāraṇemī tathaivamanimiṣapramukhaṃ rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:628: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:629: sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate,
S04bsu018_u:630: sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:632: tenaivamanvāhiṇḍatā na sa kaścijjambūdvīpe manuṣyabhūto [KpSū_62] 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto,
S04bsu018_u:635: yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:638: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā,
S04bsu018_u:639_0: so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni
S04bsu018_u:641: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:643: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:644: animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
S04bsu018_u:645: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:692: yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ [KpSū_64] sārdhamaprameyena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:693: evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:694: tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:695_0: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ
S04bsu018_u:695_1: keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayanti,
S04bsu018_u:696: adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti [KpSū_65] bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:697: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrayate,
S04bsu018_u:700: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena
S04bsu018_u:701: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:704: kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
S04bsu018_u:709_0: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā
S04bsu018_u:709_1: kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha
S04bsu018_u:710: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt,
S04bsu018_u:711: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:712: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
S04bsu018_u:713: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu018_u:715: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:717: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:719: chatraṃ copari cākāśe [KpSū_67] yāvad brahmalokaparyante sthitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:721: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
S04bsu018_u:723: rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante,
S04bsu018_u:725: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti /
S04bsu018_u:726: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:728: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati,
S04bsu018_u:729: śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān /
S04bsu018_u:730: punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:731: anyāṃśca rājaputrān paśyati mahiṣarathābhirūḍhān sumanāpuṣpābhyalaṅkṛtān [KpSū_68] kupathena dakṣiṇābhimukhān gacchataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:734: bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha,
S04bsu018_u:740: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:742_0: "hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai
S04bsu018_u:742_1: rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā
S04bsu018_u:744: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:745: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:746: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ [KpSū_69] daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:747_0: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā
S04bsu018_u:747_1: bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triśaraṇakriyāvastuṣu sthāpitāni vinītāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:748: yacca mayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saptavarṣāṇyupanimantritaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:749: tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ padmānyanupreṣitāni /
S04bsu018_u:751: tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
S04bsu018_u:756: yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni dhyāyamānāni,
S04bsu018_u:758: yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru,
S04bsu018_u:759: yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā dattāni /
S04bsu018_u:760: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye,
S04bsu018_u:763: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma,
S04bsu018_u:764: upetya svayameva bhagavato hastaśaucamupanāmayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:765: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:766_0: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:766_1: viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:767: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:768: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat,
S04bsu018_u:769: praviśya ca yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:770: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /

S04bsu018_u:772: teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ pramuñcamānāste ca raśmayastava mukhe praviśanti /

S04bsu018_u:961: " vaiśrāvaṇaḥ prāha - "śrutaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇāsti vaiśravaṇo nāma yakṣādhipatiḥ /

S04bsu018_u:1197_1: niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikabhūmau sthāpitāste ca mayā vyākartavyā buddhakṣetrāśca darśayitavyāḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:1198: atha khalu bhagavān bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1200: yena smitāviṣkaraṇenānantā paryantā buddhakṣetrā udareṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya rājño 'raṇemino 'nyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ prāṇakoṭināṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ ādarśayati /
S04bsu018_u:1201_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā
S04bsu018_u:1201_1: mahāsattvāḥ tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ lokadhātuṃ samāgatā bhagavato
S04bsu018_u:1202: te ca vividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ paryupāsya purato niṣaṇṇā bodhisattvapraṇidhānaṃ śrotukāmāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1204: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohitaḥ rājānamaraṇeminamāha - "tvaṃ tāvan mahārāja prathamaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva" /
S04bsu018_u:1205: atha rājānaṇemī yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - "ahaṃ bhagavan bodhyarthikaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1206: yanmayā māsatrayaṃ bhagavato nānāvidhairupakaraṇairupasthānaṃ kṛtamaprameyasya ca bhikṣusaṅghasya tanmayā kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1207: imāni ca bhagavan mayā saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāścintitā;
S04bsu018_u:1208: yatrāhaṃ bhagavan buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yatra na nirayā syurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1211: sarveṣāṃ tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ na syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1213: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa divyena cakṣuṣā samanvāgatāḥ syuryad buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ ca deśayataḥ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1218: sarvasattvāḥ tathāvidhenarddhikauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ syuryadekacittotpādena buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi atikrameyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1219: mā ca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ parigrahavanto 'ntataḥ svaśarīre 'pyanāgṛhītamānasāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1223: na tatra sattvānāṃ āyuḥ pramāṇaparyantaḥ syād,
S04bsu018_u:1232: yāvad vividhena bodhisattvavikurvitenākāṅkṣeyuḥ buddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathaiva teṣāṃ siddhyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1236: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
S04bsu018_u:1242: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1247: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1248: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1249: yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1250: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ [KpSū_109] teṣu ratnavṛkṣeṣu paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1251_0: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu
S04bsu018_u:1251_1: gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye
S04bsu018_u:1251_2: tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa
S04bsu018_u:1252: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1255: tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1257: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvaduṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣye yāvannaivaṃrūpairguṇairbuddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣye;
S04bsu018_u:1262: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām [KpSū_110] avabhāsayanti /
S04bsu018_u:1263: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:1265: yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:1266: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1267: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1269: bodhiprāptasya me 'nyāsu gaṇanātikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu sattvā bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1273: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1276: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste 'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1277: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te 'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1279: yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1280_0: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:1280_1: bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva
S04bsu018_u:1281: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1282: abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1283: yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1285: bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ [KpSū_112] śṛṇuyustāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1288: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1294: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño 'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu018_u:1296: gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1297: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1298: tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:1299: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ [KpSū_113] prajñaptirapyasti,
S04bsu018_u:1303: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi jñāyate /
S04bsu018_u:1304_0: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam
S04bsu018_u:1304_1: kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:1304_2: parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme 'ntarhite ṣaṣṭīnāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sā lokadhāturmeruprabhā nāma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1308: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
S04bsu018_u:1309: tasya saddharme 'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1313: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme 'ntarhite aparā nāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1314: tara ratneśvaraghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpatsyate /
S04bsu018_u:1315: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1319: evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca,
S04bsu018_u:1321: tatrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatī nāma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1324: rājāraṇemyāha - "kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ tatra buddhakṣetre [KpSū_115] 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante?" /
S04bsu018_u:1325_0: bhagavān āha - "ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo
S04bsu018_u:1325_1: digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu018_u:1326: ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete 'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1327: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1329: ekaikaścaiṣa mahārāja bodhisattvo 'nekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ antike kṛtādhikāro 'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1330: ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra prathamataraṃ buddhakṣetre buddhā bhaviṣyanti" /
S04bsu018_u:1331_0: rājāraṇemyāha - "ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yenāhaṃ sapariṣatko
S04bsu018_u:1331_1: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate?" /
S04bsu018_u:1334: rājā āha - "yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ [KpSū_116] bhagavatā vyākṛtāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1335: tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ prakampantu pracalantu /
S04bsu018_u:1336: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:1337: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1338: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1340: "santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti /
S04bsu018_u:1341_1: dvitīye 'saṃkhyeye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitaśuddhāyāṃ amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1342: samantato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayiṣyasi" /
S04bsu018_u:1347: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1349: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājño 'raṇemino jyeṣṭhaputramanimiṣaṃ nāma rājakumāramāmantrayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:1352: "avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti /
S04bsu018_u:1353: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti /
S04bsu018_u:1357: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1358: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā māmanusmareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1360: yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1361: na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1363: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu /
S04bsu018_u:1364: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:1366: pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1367: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo 'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate,
S04bsu018_u:1368: tasya praviṣṭasya yāvat saddharmaḥ sthāsyati [KpSū_119] tāvacciramahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:1370: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1372_0: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
S04bsu018_u:1372_1: dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ
S04bsu018_u:1374: evaṃ cāha - "yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ kleśapraśamanārthaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1379_0: yasyāmeva rātryāṃ prathame [KpSū_120] yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ
S04bsu018_u:1379_1: paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ
S04bsu018_u:1383_0: avalokiteśvara āha - "yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:1383_1: pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:1383_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1384: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S04bsu018_u:1387: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_121] buddhakṣetreṣu dharaṇī pracalitā,
S04bsu018_u:1388: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
S04bsu018_u:1393: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī" //
S04bsu018_u:1394: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:1396: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
S04bsu018_u:1398: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - "yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1400: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1401: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1403: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1409: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya" /

S04bsu018_u:1627: ye cātra sattvāḥ pūrvamutpāditabodhicittāste 'vaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau" /
S04bsu018_u:1628: samanantaravyāhṛte 'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti /
S04bsu018_u:1630: punarevaṃ āha - "sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheya,
S04bsu018_u:1632: pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt" /
S04bsu018_u:1636: tena tvaṃ puṇyābhisyandena daśasu [KpSū_141] dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā bahavaścaikapramāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1639_2: ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04bsu018_u:1640: dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān" /
S04bsu018_u:1641: sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1643: "uttiṣṭha suvrata surata dāntacitta sattvebhyaḥ tīvrakaruṇā mahatī pravṛttā /
S04bsu018_u:1644: tāre hi sattvān duḥkhārṇavatīraṃ saṃsthā yāvanna budhyasi anuttarabuddhabodhiṃ" //
S04bsu018_u:1646: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:1647: peyālaṃ, "na cāsmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre tatrāhaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1648: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:1649: na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1650: na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā,
S04bsu018_u:1651: na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā,
S04bsu018_u:1652: na ca tatra sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1653: na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā;
S04bsu018_u:1655: sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:1656: māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet;
S04bsu018_u:1658: nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā nānāmālyebhyo nānāvādyairnānāratnabhājanairnānāpuṣpaiśca te ratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtā [KpSū_143] bhaveyuḥ;

S04bsu018_u:1665: yena daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1666: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ sarve jātismarā bhaveyuste ca buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān anusmareyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1667: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarve evaṃrūpaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1668: yat samantāddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1669: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarva evaṃrūpeṇa paracittajñānakauśalyena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1670: yadekakṣaṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāṃ vijāneyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāṃ [KpSū_144] te sattvāstāṃ samādhiṃ praṇāmeyū;
S04bsu018_u:1671: rātryāḥ pratyuṣakālasamaye caturdiśaṃ sugandhāḥ prītikarāśca mṛdusukhasaṃsparśā vāyavo vāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1673: te ca bodhisattvāstābhyaḥ samādhibhyo vyutthihitvā tebhyaḥ puṣpakeśarebhya uttiṣṭheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1674: tathārūpaṃ ca ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratilabheran yad ekacittakṣaṇene buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānyekaikāṃ diśaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1675: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavato vanditvā paryupāsitvā tadā nivarteyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1677: dharmasukhamanasikāreṇa tathāgataṃ prekṣeyuryena yena ca niṣīdeyuḥ parivarteyurvā sarvadiśāsu ca māmeva paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1678: yathārūpaṃ ca tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimatidharmeṣu saṃśayotpadyeta tatsarvaṃ mama darśanavyavalokanamātreṇa vigaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1679: yathārūpaṃ ca dharmadeśanān te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathārūpaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ mama vyavalokanamātreṇājāneyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1683: sarve ca tatra bodhisattvā avaivartikā bhaveyuḥ /

S04bsu018_u:1689: sarve ca tatra sattvā muṇḍā navakāṣāyacīvaraprāvṛtāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1693: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhiduḥkhaṃ prajñāyeta /

S04bsu018_u:1696: caturdiśaśca vāyava āgaccheyuḥ ye tāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu kṣipeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1697: evaṃrūpāśca mahāmaṇiratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tadyathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ prabhāsvaraṃ maṇiratnaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1698: ye ca tatra sattvāstāṃ maṇiratnaprabhāṃ paśyeyuḥ taṃ vā maṇiratnaṃ paśyeyuḥ spārśeyurvā te sarve narakatiryagyamalokaduḥkhāni yāvadbodhinirvāṇena mā pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1699: te ca tataścyavitvā tatropapadyeyuḥ yatra tiṣṭhanto [KpSū_146] yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu018_u:1700: tatropapannāśca te sattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuste ca bodhicittamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1702: na kaścitsattvo mama buddhakṣetre 'samāhitaḥ kālaṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu018_u:1703: na duḥkhavedanāyā na parasparavyāvadhacittāviprayogamaraṇāya tataśca mārākṣaṇeṣupapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1704: yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ buddhadarśanenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1705: sarve ca tatra sattvā apagatakhiladveṣamrakṣerṣyāmātsaryā bhaveyuḥ /

S04bsu018_u:1711: daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ lokadhātubhirdṛśyeta gandhena ca sphuret /

S04bsu018_u:1716: tataḥ paścād ahaṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:1722: yathāvidhāśca samādhidhāraṇīrākāṅkṣeta tathārūpā māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1723: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ śītanarake pratyājātā bhaveyusteṣāṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhāvedanā prādurbhavet,
S04bsu018_u:1724_0: tathārūpāṃ ca sukhāṃ vedanāṃ pratilabheran yathāpi nāma dvitīyadhyānasamāpannasya
S04bsu018_u:1724_1: bhikṣoste ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā parameṇa kāyacaitasikena sukhena samarpitā bhaveyuste ca
S04bsu018_u:1726: ye ca sattvāḥ pretabhavaneṣūpapannāḥ mama paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1729: evaṃ devāḥ dviguṇā ca me prabhāsayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1732: bodhiprāptasya ca me daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto mama varṇaṃ bhāṣeranyeṣāṃ anuśrāvayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1733: ye ca tatra sattvā mama varṇaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te tatra mama buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1734: te kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ sthāpayitvānantaryakārakāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakāṃ āryāpavādakāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1735: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ mama ca buddhakṣetra upapattiṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ,

S04bsu018_u:1745: te sattvā mamāntike paramaprītiprasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ bodhau ca cittānyutpādyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1749: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:1752: sa prāha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣatu /
S04bsu018_u:1753: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ te sarve bodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1754: ahaṃ caitarhi [KpSū_150] praṇītadyutiṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1756: utpāditaśca kulaputra praṇītadyutiḥ samādhiḥ svayamevādrākṣīt tadbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu uragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1757: daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ prāñjalibhūtā adrākṣuḥ,

S04bsu018_u:1763: prabhāsavirajaḥsamucchrayagandheśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān" /
S04bsu018_u:1765: atha khalu kulaputra siṃhagandho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditavān /

S04bsu018_u:1769: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'ṣṭamaṃ rājaputramamighaṃ nāmāmantrayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:1770: peyālaṃ, "tāvadahaṃ bhagavan kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhisattvabhūto bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ daśasahasrān kliṣṭān buddhakṣetrānevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:1774: tathārūpāmahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā nānye bodhisattvāścaranti /
S04bsu018_u:1775: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannimāni saptavarṣāṇi buddhaguṇabodhisattvaguṇapariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇapariśuddhaṃ rahogata ekākī saṃcintayamāno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1776: darśanavyūhasamādhipūrvaṃgamena ekadaśabodhisattvasamādhisahasrāṇi yāni mayātrotpāditāni pratilabdhāni bhāvitāni,
S04bsu018_u:1777: eṣā mama bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūtasya bodhisattvacārikā;
S04bsu018_u:1778: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantāsvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:1779: ye trādhvasamatikrāntā dhvajāgrākeyūrā buddhakṣetrāstāṃ paripūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ āvarteyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1780: tena ca samādhināhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan paramāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavato bodhisattvaśrāvakagaṇaparivṛtān paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1782: [KpSū_153] ekaikena cāhaṃ kāyenānuttarairvicitrai ratnaiḥ puṣpairanuttarairvicitrairgandhairmālyaiśca curṇavilepanairvādyaiḥ sarvābhiścānuttarābhirvyūhābhirekaikaṃ pūjayeyaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:1787: araṇāsamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekacittakṣaṇena sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānatītānāgatapratyutpannān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1792: tataścyavitvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ [KpSū_154] yatra buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1806: yathārūpeṇa ca sattvāḥ karmapratyayena sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhāṃ vā pratisaṃvedayanti,
S04bsu018_u:1813_0: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā daśasu sarvabuddhakṣetrasahasreṣu
S04bsu018_u:1813_1: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantatiṃ tathā pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā pūrvakarmakleśāṃ na kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1817: evaṃ mayā svabuddhakṣetrasya svaparṣāyā ca yathā siṃhagandhena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1818: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā daśasu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśāmyantu,
S04bsu018_u:1823: yena te sattvāḥ tān buddhān pūjayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1825: ahaṃ ca bhagavan darśanavyūhasamādhānabalena svayaṃ paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1826: sahodīritayāṃ vācāsminnevameva svayaṃ paśyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" iti /

S04bsu018_u:1832_1: parivartāvaśiṣṭe dvitīya uttarāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni
S04bsu018_u:1834: jñānavajravijṛmbhiteśvaraketurnāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān" /
S04bsu018_u:1835: atha khalu kulaputra samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta /
S04bsu018_u:1837: "uttiṣṭha surata suvrata dāntacittā sattvāna santati viśodhya dṛḍhapratijñatvaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:2831: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2832: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2833: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2834: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2836: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2837: [KpSū_240] tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2840: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
S04bsu018_u:2841: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2844_0: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
S04bsu018_u:2844_1: śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā
S04bsu018_u:2844_2: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2846: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ [KpSū_241] prasādaṃ pratilaṃbhayet /
S04bsu018_u:2847: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
S04bsu018_u:2848: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2849: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
S04bsu018_u:2850: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2851: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2852: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2853_0: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
S04bsu018_u:2855: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ sattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyasamuccayena [KpSū_242] samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2856: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2857: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2858: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
S04bsu018_u:2865: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2867: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2873: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
S04bsu018_u:2876: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
S04bsu018_u:2877: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2879: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
S04bsu018_u:2882: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:2884: ye manuṣyarājā [KpSū_244] vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā gṛhāgārasaṃpannāste 'pi mama duṣkaracaryāmupasaṃkrāmeyuryāvacchrāvakayānikā yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2886: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:2888: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
S04bsu018_u:2889: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2891: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
S04bsu018_u:2893_0: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena
S04bsu018_u:2893_1: vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:2894: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ [KpSū_245] śaktāṃścarantu yathāhaṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2895: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2900: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2907: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2908: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2910: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:2912: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2914: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2918: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2919: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2920: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2923: [KpSū_247] na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:2925_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ
S04bsu018_u:2928: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2929_0: ye 'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2929_1: śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2930: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrādeko buddhavigraha ekadivase [KpSū_248] sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu018_u:2931: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2932: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2933: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:2935: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2937: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2938: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2939: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2940: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04bsu018_u:2941: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:2942: [KpSū_249] piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:2943: teṣām sattvānāmarthe 'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2944: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2949: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2950: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste 'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2951: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2957: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2958: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2961: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3042_0: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:3042_2: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3081: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3085_0: ye 'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā
S04bsu018_u:3085_1: dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:3086: akuśalamūlasamavadhānā rukṣāḥ pāpecchāḥ [KpSū_260] krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3087: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3088: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3089: dānapāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3090: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3100: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3101: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3104: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3105: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3107: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte 'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3108: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3109: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3110: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ [KpSū_262] vaiyāvṛtyakarmāṇi nirdiśeyam,
S04bsu018_u:3120: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:3122: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane 'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3124: ye 'pi śṛṇuyuścittaṃ [KpSū_263] vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
S04bsu018_u:3126_0: yāvat saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmolkāyāṃ nirvāpitāyāṃ dharmadhvaje patite te ca
S04bsu018_u:3126_1: mama janmaśarīramavatareyuryāvat kāñcanacakre tiṣṭheyuryasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre
S04bsu018_u:3126_2: ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ tiṣṭhet /
S04bsu018_u:3127: tacca tato 'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,
S04bsu018_u:3129_0: tataśca puṣpavarṣādvividhā śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabda
S04bsu018_u:3132: sarve ca rūpāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ [KpSū_265] svakasvakāni pūrvakṛtāni kuśalamūlānyanusmareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3133: sarvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvā ajugupsanīyāste tato 'vatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3134: evameva sarve kāmāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyusteṣāṃ ca tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaratikrīḍāsaumanasyābhiratāṃścittacaitasikāṃ sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3136: te ca devalokādavatīrya sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3137: te ca puṣpā ākāśe vividhā ratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3139: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṃ ratnavṛṣṭiṃ abhipravarṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3140: sarve ca sahe buddhakṣetre kalikalahavivādadurbhikṣarogaparacakraparuṣavāgrukṣaviṣaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ praśameyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3141: kṣemārogyā akalahābandhanavigrahāḥ subhikṣāḥ sarve sahe buddhakṣetre saṃsthiheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3142_0: [KpSū_266] yāni ca sattvāni tāni ratnāni paśyeyuḥ spṛśyeyuḥ upabhogakarma vā kurvīran

S04bsu018_u:4000: gaṇanātikrāntaśca sattvā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā,
S04bsu018_u:4002: ayaṃ ca me kalyāṇamitro 'sārāt kāyāt sāramādadāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:4003: sa rājāha - "tuṣṭo bhava dadāmi te imaṃ prākṛtamāṃsacakṣustenāhaṃ labheyānuttaraṃ dharmacakṣuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4004: dadāmi te imaṃ svakaṃ carma prasannacittena,
S04bsu018_u:4006: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo dakṣiṇena hastenobhau netrāvutpādyājīvikasya datvā rudhiramrakṣitena mukhenāha /
S04bsu018_u:4007: "śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye 'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā,
S04bsu018_u:4008: bodhāya mayā dānaṃ nāmitaṃ śubhaṃ prāpsye 'haṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4010: ghorāt saṃsārārṇavāt pāre 'nuttare nirvāṇe śive sthāpayeyaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4012: tāvacciraṃ mama jīvitendriyaṃ mā nirudhyeta mā ca me smṛtirnaśyeta mā ca me vipratisāro bhaved,
S04bsu018_u:4013: yāvacciramasyājīvikasya sā vidyā na siddhā bhavet" /
S04bsu018_u:4015: sa ca kulaputra pāṃśughoṣājīvikastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā rājño dhriyataḥ kāyaccarmamapanetvā carma gṛhītvā vidyāṃ sādhayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:4016: tathā saptadivasāni rājñaḥ puṇyabalasya jīvitendriyaṃ na niruddhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4018: na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
S04bsu018_u:4020: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva,
S04bsu018_u:4021: na cānyo draṣṭavyo 'haṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā /
S04bsu018_u:4023: prathamacittotpādena ca me gaṇānātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:4024: ayaṃ me prathamaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:4025: so 'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:4026: tadā me caṇḍālavaṃśe [KpSū_353] sthitvā sattvāṃ kuśale niyojya svabalaparākrameṇa yāvadbalacakravartitvaṃ prāptaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4030: yadā ca me svanetrāḥ parityaktāḥ svacarmaparityāgaśca /
S04bsu018_u:4031: so 'haṃ tataścyutastatraiva saṃkarṣaṇe kṣetre dvitīye dvīpe praṇidhānavaśena caṇḍālakula upapannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4032: peyālaṃ, tatra ca mayaivaṃrūpeṇa dṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇa sattvānniyojayitvā kuśaleṣu karmeṣu,
S04bsu018_u:4036: tatra ca svaśarīrāt jihvā karṇau ca parityaktau,
S04bsu018_u:4037: yāvat sarvan tatsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ mahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4038: praṇidhānadṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇānuprabandhena praṇidhānavaśena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4042: ityarthaṃ kulaputrānyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4043: yadā te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhicaryāṃ caramāṇā na parāmāpattyā [KpSū_354] codayanti,
S04bsu018_u:4046: ityarthaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ paripūrṇābhiprāyāṇāṃ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:4053: na ca tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya nāma prajñaptiprādurbhāvo 'sti /
S04bsu018_u:4054_0: yadā ca mayā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu mahākalpeṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:4054_1: buddhakṣetreṣu paruṣavacanabhayena sattvāḥ prāṇātipātavairamaṇye samādāpitā yāvattriṣu
S04bsu018_u:4055: [KpSū_355] tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa ma etarhyevaṃ parikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ akuśalaśabdenāpūritaṃ akuśalamūlasamavadhānagataiḥ sattvaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4057: yathā ca me pūrvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4058: yādṛśāśca me sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstadṛśenaiva balavīryodyogena bodhicārikāḥ cīrṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4059: yādṛśaṃ caiva bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratilabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4061: saṃkṣiptena te kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4062: na kenacit pūrvaṃ bodhisattvenaivaṃrūpaḥ dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4063: na ca punaḥ kaścidbodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ya evaṃrūpaṃ dānaparityāgaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ parityajati,
S04bsu018_u:4064: yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaṃ parityaktaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4067: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāṃ [KpSū_356] sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:4071: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtavān gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā kalpātikrāntāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4073: adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu018_u:4074: evaṃ ca vadanti sārakusumito bodhisattvo dṛḍhavīryasamādhāno balavegaparityāgena bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
S04bsu018_u:4075_1: nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
S04bsu018_u:4076: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:4077_0: prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭo [KpSū_357] nāma bodhisattvaḥ satpuruṣa ekasya mahākalpasyātyayena
S04bsu018_u:4077_1: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhairavatī nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4078: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:4079_0: ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ kalpairnirdiṣṭitairuparimasyāṃ diśi kṣāravarcanikuñjitāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4079_1: lokadhātau pañcakaṣāye tīvrakaluṣasaṃkṣobhaṇe kalpe 'sau saṃrocanaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena
S04bsu018_u:4080: acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:4081: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena daśavarṣāni sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati /
S04bsu018_u:4084: tataḥ paścādasau prahasitabāhurbodhisattvastatra ca kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:4086: so 'pi daśavarṣāṇi sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati /
S04bsu018_u:4087: tasya ca parinirvṛtasya pūrvapraṇidhānena saptavarṣāṇi saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu018_u:4088_0: atra dvau satpuruṣau labdhapūrvavyākaraṇau labdhāsvādāvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:4088_1: bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prītisaumanasyaprāmodyena saptatālamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe
S04bsu018_u:4089: "virocase buddha yathaiva sūrya abhyudgato merurimasmiṃ loke /
S04bsu018_u:4090: viśuddhacakṣurvirajā vināyakā ālokabhūtā sugatā namo 'stu te //
S04bsu018_u:4091: bahūni kalpāna ti vīryabhāvitā paryeṣamāṇena ti agrabodhi /
S04bsu018_u:4093: bahujinā pūjitā pūrve ye tvayā na caiva te vyākarṣīmatitanāyakāḥ //
S04bsu018_u:4094: prahīṇarāgā parimuktacittā kṛtaṃ ti kāryamiha sarvaloke /
S04bsu018_u:4095: praṇaṣṭamārgāṇa deśesi dharmaṃ sattvāṃśca uttārayase bhavārṇavāt //
S04bsu018_u:4096: vayaṃ pi pravrajya svayaṃbhūśāsane yā prātimokṣa jina śikṣa deśitā /
S04bsu018_u:4097: vayaṃ pi śikṣitva samāhitendriyā tavaiva āsanna sadā bhavemaḥ //
S04bsu018_u:4103: te catvāro dharaṇidatto vīryasaṃcodanaḥ sārakusumitaḥ prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4104: ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu /
S04bsu018_u:4106: yadāsīttena kālena tena samayenedaṃ buddhakṣetramarajamerujugupsitaṃ nāmābhut,
S04bsu018_u:4107_0: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:4107_1: śāsane saddharmapratirūpake [KpSū_361] vartamāne 'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano
S04bsu018_u:4107_2: nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4109: te 'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4110: sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4117: , yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito 'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4126: ta āhur["]yadyasmākaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ dadyādevaṃ [KpSū_362] vayaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayemaḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4127: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4129: āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā /
S04bsu018_u:4130: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4133: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4134: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4144: "]tato 'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot /
S04bsu018_u:4148: yathā tyajāmi priyarūpasaṃpadaṃ na śakrabrahmāṇa na mārakāraṇāt /
S04bsu018_u:4149: arthaṃ karo bheṣyasi devaloke bhaveyaṃ mahyaṃ bahumānsaśoṇitaṃ //
S04bsu018_u:4150: śṛṇvantu nāgā naradevayakṣā ye devatā śailagirau nivāsiṇaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4151: kṛpā mamotpannaya sattvahetoḥ tarpaṣya sattvāṃ svakamāṃsaśoṇitaiḥ" //
S04bsu018_u:4161: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
S04bsu018_u:4163: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4170: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
S04bsu018_u:4175: [KpSū_365] ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:4190: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:4198: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4200: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
S04bsu018_u:4203: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4207: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
S04bsu018_u:4208: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4209: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4210: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4211_0: evameva samantaddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_367] buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4211_1: yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:4213: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:4215_0: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ
S04bsu018_u:4215_1: mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4217: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
S04bsu018_u:4218: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā /
S04bsu018_u:4219: ye 'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4220: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4221_0: paśya [KpSū_368] kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena
S04bsu018_u:4221_1: tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:4223: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
S04bsu018_u:4225: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī /
S04bsu018_u:4226: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā,
S04bsu018_u:4230: paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4234: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4235: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti [KpSū_369] karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
S04bsu018_u:4241: yaddevasya divasedivase 'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate /
S04bsu018_u:4246: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4247: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
S04bsu018_u:4248: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4249: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4250: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ [KpSū_370] tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa cintāmaṇiḥ samāsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4251: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4252: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4253_0: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro
S04bsu018_u:4253_1: duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko 'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /

S04bsu018_u:4262_0: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot
S04bsu018_u:4262_2: hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā

S04bsu018_u:4271: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4273: [KpSū_372] evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho 'bhūvan,
S04bsu018_u:4274: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
S04bsu018_u:4276: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4280: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4281: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo 'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4282: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:4286: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4287: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4288: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4296: "yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā [KpSū_374] nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4298: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4300: tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4302: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4309: tadanena kulaputra [KpSū_375] kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4312_1: devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu
S04bsu018_u:4314: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4315: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4320: anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4321: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4322: apyanuttareṇa [KpSū_376] jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
S04bsu018_u:4325: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ
S04bsu018_u:4326: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye 'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
S04bsu018_u:4328: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4330: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4331: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4333: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
S04bsu018_u:4334: tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ [KpSū_377] yāvaccendranīlamahānīlajyotīrasadakaprasādakāni yācanakānāṃ tāvatprabhūtāni ratnāni labhyante /
S04bsu018_u:4340: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4342: "yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4344: yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4345: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4346: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
S04bsu018_u:4348: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ [KpSū_378] ca,

S04bsu018_u:4354: ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4355: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño 'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:4365: [KpSū_379] atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati" /
S04bsu018_u:4366: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño 'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
S04bsu018_u:4368: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:4372: yo 'yaṃ mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
S04bsu018_u:4377: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4378: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,
S04bsu018_u:4381: [KpSū_380] tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
S04bsu018_u:4382: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
S04bsu018_u:4385: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4386: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
S04bsu018_u:4395: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4396: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
S04bsu018_u:4398: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4404: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4411: na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
S04bsu018_u:4413: ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu /
S04bsu018_u:4414: yāvacca [KpSū_382] me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu,
S04bsu018_u:4415: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa /
S04bsu018_u:4416: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā;
S04bsu018_u:4417_0: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:4417_1: cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya
S04bsu018_u:4418: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4419: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4423: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4427: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca /
S04bsu018_u:4432: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:4433: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4434: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
S04bsu018_u:4435: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
S04bsu018_u:4439: yathātra pūrve na [KpSū_384] ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4441: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:4443: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4444: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
S04bsu018_u:4446: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4447: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti /
S04bsu018_u:4455: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
S04bsu018_u:4457: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena [KpSū_385] vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:4458: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4461: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4464: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
S04bsu018_u:4465: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4468: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4470: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
S04bsu018_u:4471: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_386] śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4472: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4473: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4475: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4477: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4483: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4487: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4489: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //
S04bsu018_u:4491: VI (EPILOGUE) yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān,
S04bsu018_u:4492: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4493: ye mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4494: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4495: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4498_1: [KpSū_389] saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate
S04bsu018_u:4499: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
