S04bsu018_u:4734: ekasmin samaye kulaputra sa śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā viṣamaśailendraparvatamadhye indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati sma,
S04bsu018_u:4737: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā [KpSū_409] sphuṭā tathāgatakāyena,
S04bsu018_u:4739: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhyo digbhyaḥ dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sahe lokadhātau saṃprāptāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya /
S04bsu018_u:4741: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4743: yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4745: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājastathāgataḥ candrarocavimalān puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā vigopaśikharasya bodhisattvasya dadāti saṃrocanabuddhasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S04bsu018_u:4746: evaṃ cāha - "gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4748: [KpSū_410] "vayamapi bhagavan gamiṣyāmastathāgatasyānubhāvena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya" /
S04bsu018_u:4750: tatastau dvau bodhisattvau sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya tathāgatasya riddhyanubhāvena tato virajādbuddhakṣetrātsaṃprasthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4758: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti,
S04bsu018_u:4760: evaṃ sālendrarājā vikramaraśmiḥ padmottaraḥ [KpSū_411] candano merurājaḥ sāgaraḥ sārajyotirjñānavikramastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4761_0: yāvattena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā uttarapurimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatāste bodhisattvāḥ
S04bsu018_u:4762: tāvadeva śākyamunistathāgata ṛddhyanubhāvena sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitāsteṣāṃ ekaikasya sattvasya yojanapramāṇamātramātmabhāvaḥ saṃsthitaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4763: sarvāvantaṃ ca sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4764: na kaścidbuddhakṣetre kṣitau vā gagane vāvakāśo yaḥ sattvairasphuṭo 'ntaśo 'ñjanaśalākāpradeśamātramapi yaḥ sattvebhyo na sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4765: sarve ca te sattvāḥ śūnyamākāśaṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:4768: na lokāntarikā [KpSū_412] divyā vimānā ūrddhaṃ yāvadadho kāñcanacakraṃ tatorddhaṃ pṛthivī cakṣuṣo nābhāsamāgacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:4771: tatra ca bhagavān ākāśasphuraṇaṃ dharmāvacchedapraśrabdhisamādhiṃ samāpanno /
S04bsu018_u:4772: yataste candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ sarvaromamukhesu bhagavataḥ praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:4773: sarve ca te sattvāḥ paśyanti sahe lokadhātāvantargatā vigatāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaitasikeṣu manasikārarūpasaṃdarśanatāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4774: te caiva bhagavato romamukhe nirīkṣante sma /
S04bsu018_u:4776: nānāratnavṛkṣaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānāpuṣpaṃ nānāphalākīrṇāṃ nānāvastraṃ nānācchatradhvajapatākākeyūramuktikāhārālaṅkṛtāṃstāṃ vṛkṣāṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:4780: sarve ca te sattvā ye [KpSū_413] sahe lokadhātāvantargatāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4782: sarve pariśiṣṭāḥ sattvāstasya tathāgatasya romamukhebhyastathāgataśarīre praviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4786: maitreyo bodhisattva āha - "saṃprajānaṃ tataḥ sattvāḥ samanvāharata sarve vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣau sannipatitāḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4787: tataste sattvāḥ sāntarabāhiraṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ pratyakṣībhūtā "yathā vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣāvantargatāḥ sannipatitāśca",
S04bsu018_u:4791_0: tato maitreyaḥ sarvāvatī parṣadaṃ svareṇa vijñapayannuvāca - "śṛṇvantu bhavantastathāgatasyaivamṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ
S04bsu018_u:4791_1: yadasmākaṃ hitakaraḥ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati tadyuṣmābhiḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhartavyāḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4810: imasya khalu punardharmaparyāyasya bhāṣyamāṇasyāśītikoṭīgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāḥ sattvāstathāgatasya kukṣigatā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
S04bsu018_u:4811: gaṇanātikrāntāśca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye nānāvidhadhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā abhūn /
S04bsu018_u:4816: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ purimāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4817: purimāyāṃ diśi yadbuddhakṣetrānatikrāmanti na ca śākyamunestathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalaṃ pratihanyate,
S04bsu018_u:4818: evaṃ ca tatra svaraṃ śṛṇvanti vicitrapadārthavyañjanāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4821: [KpSū_416] api ca tatrāpi śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:4822_0: śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyaḥ sphuṭo dṛśyate bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiścāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā
S04bsu018_u:4822_1: bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāścaikaromamukhe śākyamunestathāgatasya praviśanto niṣkrāmantaśca saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:4826_0: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā yāvadbhagavataḥ kāyāntargatāḥ sā bhagavataḥ kāyaromamukhebhyo
S04bsu018_u:4826_1: niṣkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇī kṛtvā bhagavato
S04bsu018_u:4827: atha tāvaccaiva kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā vicitrāṃ ca gandhamālyavilepanavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣitā,
S04bsu018_u:4830: tatra vaiśāradyasamuddhāraṇirnāma bodhisattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - [KpSū_417] "kiṃ nāmāyaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahāvyākaraṇaṃ sūtrāntaḥ?" /
S04bsu018_u:4841: punarapyāha - "kiyantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4842: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi?" /
S04bsu018_u:4845: yaḥ kaścidimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi,
S04bsu018_u:4846: yaśca punaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāmantaśo likhitvā dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4848: na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4850: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ prasādanaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4872: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4873: adharmabhūmiṣṭhānāṃ sattvānāṃ bhinnaśīlānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ [KpSū_419] karṇapuṭe prakāśayiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4875: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya;
S04bsu018_u:4877: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān /
S04bsu018_u:4878: bhagavān āha - "udgṛhṇa tvaṃ maharṣa imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4879: yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ deśāntaragatānāmavaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karṇapuṭeṣu prakāśasva /
S04bsu018_u:4880_1: atikrāmantā yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4880_2: samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4882: [KpSū_420] ahaṃ ca sattvānāṃ svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ udgṛhīṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4884: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu018_u:4887: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4888: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ //
